channel.title: Connecting to ip, code is different

item.title: Connecting to ip, code is different
item.dc:creator: @nsteger123 nsteger123
item.description:
@nsteger123 wrote:

Ok, well i have 2 clients. And 1 worked but it was for my other server and the code for the ip was

System.out.println("Connecting to Undetainable's Server"); Serverip = "undetainable.no-ip.biz"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

And this other client for my new server the code is

System.out.println("Connecting to Stickay Scape"); //launchURL"stickayscape.no-ip.biz"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

The second client for my new server doesn’t connect. I change the ip on the 1st client and tried but it didnt work either. Im thinking its serverside but i dont really know. If someone could help i’d appreciate that.

Read full topic
